name: formatjs-repo
description: This repository is the home of FormatJS and related libraries.

scripts.build: npm run build:bootstrap && npm run build:packages
scripts.cover:collect: mkdir -p ./.nyc_output/ && for d in $(find packages -type d -name '.nyc_output' -maxdepth 2 -exec find '{}' -type f ';'); do (cp $d ./.nyc_output/); done; nyc report --reporter=lcov --report-dir=${COVERAGE_DIR:-artifacts/coverage}
scripts.test: lerna run lint --since --stream && lerna run test --since --stream

author: Seth Bertalotto <sbertal@verizonmedia.com>
